Comment: ”The US will be withdrawing from an international group investigating Russia’s alleged war crimes in Ukraine — including those perpetrated by[ President Vladimir Putin](https://nypost.com/2025/03/17/world-news/trump-says-he-will-speak-with-putin-on-tuesday-about-ending-war-in-ukraine/), according to a letter sent to European allies on Monday.
